description:
go.tools/go/types: test against test/fixedbugs

Fixed several bugs:
- lhs blank identifier may be parenthesized: (_) = 0 is ok
- constant shift counts in non-constant shifts must be >= 0
- init functions must have a body

Classified currently failing tests:
- 10 classes of errors not checked at the moment

messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

Hey, just to be clear: I only hit Send once but when I went back to the
window:

Sorry, an error occurred...

Unhandled exception.

Details: The API call mail.Send() took too long to respond and was
cancelled. [DeadlineExceededError]

Please post a message to the discussion
group<http://groups.google.com/group/codereview-discuss> if
you have any questions.

On 2013/08/01 00:52:37, r wrote:
> Hey, just to be clear: I only hit Send once but when I went back to the
> window:
> 
> Sorry, an error occurred...
> 
> Unhandled exception.
> 
> Details: The API call mail.Send() took too long to respond and was
> cancelled. [DeadlineExceededError]
> 
> Please post a message to the discussion
> group<http://groups.google.com/group/codereview-discuss> if
> you have any questions.

LGTM

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a02c44114e33&repo=tools ***

go.tools/go/types: test against test/fixedbugs

Fixed several bugs:
- lhs blank identifier may be parenthesized: (_) = 0 is ok
- constant shift counts in non-constant shifts must be >= 0
- init functions must have a body

Classified currently failing tests:
- 10 classes of errors not checked at the moment

R=adonovan, r
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 11952046: go.tools/go/types: test agains test/fixedbugs
